name: Legwraps of toughened kelp
data: It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It has nice armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
